pageContext.claim: “For instance, this morning, a number of people came out and said, 'You do need very strong border security, and that includes a wall or whatever it is.' A number of Democrats said that, but people don't like to report on it. We have tremendous unity in the Republican Party.”
pageContext.analysis: There is virtually no support among Democrats in Congress for Trump's border wall, though many say they support enhanced border security that does not include a wall.
